text: Who moved my sugar? #GiveItBackNow #NotFunny
Barn Meeting Tuesday after Jones' rounds.  Please ReTrot. #CommunityMeeting #IHadADream
@OldMajor.  Will there be snacks? #sugar
Meeting Preview: "All animals are comrades. #Teaser
@Benjamin. Do you know what a comrade is? #WhatWouldBenjaminSay?
Meeting Preview: "Get your singing voice ready. #Teaser
The birds can sing. Think I may need to mime!
Meeting Preview: "Man is the only creature that consumes without producing #Teaser #DontBeLate
Well done Rats, so glad you're now comrades. #PartOfTheTeam
Amazing meeting. Thanks @OldMajor. I love "Beasts of England
Did you hear me singing? Do you like my voice? #HorseXFactor
Thank you @OldMajor for an inspiring meeting. #LongLiveOM #AllAnimalsAreEqual
What did you think @Benjamin?  He's inspiring isn't he? #LongLiveOM #BeastsOfEngland
@Boxer.  He's ok.  Good for his age. #NotAsOldAsMe
I'm sure I heard a fox last night. Vermin. I fired out the window. That would've got rid. #ScaredyFox
We will miss you Old Major. You were an inspiration. #RIPOldMajor
I'll miss him so much.  What will I do? I feel terrible.  I'll wear a black ribbon. #NeedSugar #RIPOldMajor
Announcement: Old Major's funeral.  Weds 2pm in the orchard.  Bring anything you may want to say.  Please ReTrot. #RIPOldMajor
Don't worry everyone.  Remember Sugarcandy Mountain? That's where Old Major is.  He will be happy there. #RIPOldMajor #Utopia
Announcement: Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays in the barn. Animalism 101.  Inspired by Old Major.  Pls ReTrot #SeeYouThere #Beginners #Animalism
Thanks for tonight's class @Snowball @Squealer.  Can we discuss more about how it will be better in the future than now?
I don't understand why there will be no sugar. #WhyNoSugar?
Can someone explain the problem with wearing ribbons please?  I don't get it.  I need my ribbons. #What's Left?
Like I said @Mollie, they are a badge of slavery. #freedom #rebellion
Bored. Bored. Bored. Bored. #EyeRoll
Just for fun!  What is your Animal Farm name?  Ask Muriel to read it to you if you need help. Reply with your new name! #JustForFun #WhatsYourName #DistractionTactic
Where's Jones? I'm starving. #NoFood.
Wonder if anyone could ram the door.  We MUST eat soon. #SoHungry #NomNom
Ok. Hang on everyone.  I'm going to ram the door.  We MUST eat soon. #SoHungry #NomNom
Oh look. There goes Moses. With the humans. Surprise surprise. #Traitor #Spy
Bye straw hat. You've been good to me, but no clothes allowed
Noooooooo.  Not my ribbons. @Squealer please? #Broken
No more Jones! Come to the storeroom for extra food. #ByeByeJones #Loadsafood
8am tomorrow. Recce of the farm. OUR farm. Pls ReTrot. #WeWon #Rebellion #LoadsOfRoom
Boxer made me do this
As agreed.  The farmhouse is now a museum.  Not a place to live.
Animal Farm not Manor Farm. #LongLiveAnimalFarm
You seen the latest? Pls ReTrot #7Commandments
Which is your favourite commandment?  Answer in the comments. #LoveTheSeven #TheWayForward
Nice work on the harvest, comrades. #WotNoMilk #NothingToSeeHere
Come and collect your new animal friendly tools. #Accessibility #EqualOppsTools
So the pigs have got things to work out, so we aren't able to work with you. #WithYouInSpirit
Wow! Have you seen how much harvest we managed?  I've never seen such a huge harvest. #WellDoneComrades #WhatATeam
A big shout out to the hens and ducks for making sure there was no wastage. #TheVeryLastStalk
Look how cute I was
@Boxer, you are working like 3 horses.How do you do it? #SoStrong #MyHero
I will work harder
Thanks for all your concern (not). None of you has ever seen a dead donkey #cryptic
Soz I had to leave work early today, had a huge stone in my hoof. You may have seen me limping back? #Ouch #EnormousSharpStone #ReallyNeedSugar
From next Sunday afternoon, reading lessons. Open to all. #ReadThoseCommandments
Napoleon was here!
Loving no work Sundays. Thanks to the pigs. #LongLiveAnimalFarm
Our new flag. Pls ReTrot. #Animalism #HoofAndHorn
Remember the flag raising ceremony this Sunday. Pls ReTrot. #AnimalFarm #Animalism #LoveAFlag
Thanks to the pigs for all the resolutions.  That's why you're in charge and we follow. #WhatWouldThePigsDo
Announcement: New animal committees. Join up list on the barn wall. Ask a friend to write your name if you can't.
Egg Production Committee. Clean Tails League. Wild Comrades' Re-education Committee. Whiter Wool Movement. Pls ReTrot #Committees #SignUp
Erm @Cat. The Wild Comrades' Re-education Committed isn't really for you.  Please stop scaring the sparrows.
Sorry everyone. Gonna be late for work again.  Will make it up to you. #Overslept #Teamwork.
Post your reading and writing wins and we'll all ReTrot #BigAnimalRead
If you want some reading practise. I'll be in the barn every evening after work, ready to help.  Everyone welcome. #Community
When will there be something worth reading around here? #StillGrumpy
ABCD
Change of plan everyone. To make things easier, we've decided to reduce the 7 commandments to "Four Legs Good. Two Legs Bad." Pls ReTrot. #JustOneToRemember #Animalism
What about the birds @Snowball? #BirdsAreComradesToo
Wings count.
Thanks to the pigs for encouraging us in the field. #motiation
This was fun to do!
Thanks for the puppies. #EducateThemYoung #SchoolLoft
Thanks for the generous contribution of milk and apples to the pigs. #PigBrainWorkers #FarmSuccess
Great! #LoveApples #EvenMoreGrumpy
Milk and apples proven to help pigs’ brains. Science: Milk + apples for pigs = No. More. Jones. #Animalism #Rebellion #LongLiveAnimalFarm
Good-for-nothing animals. #ItsMyFarm
I can't believe what they've done to me #SeriouslyItsMyFarm
Why don't you come fishing with me @Jones. Maybe a bit less beer will help?
@Pilkington How can a decent farmer let this happen? #Rubbish Farmer
@Frederick I know.  But at least he's drunk enough to keep paying for the drinks #FreeBeerAllRound
I've heard the animals at Manor Farm have turned to cannibalism. #LowerFormOfLife
Great work by the pigeons. Beasts of England is being sung across all the farms #BiggerRebellion #Animalism #4LegsGood2LegsBad
Jones is back. With his men and other farmers. Jones is back. JONES IS BACK.
Right everyone. This is it. #WhatWouldCaesarDo
What have I done? I have no wish to take a life. #BigShoes #BrokenHeart
War is war. The only good human is a dead one. #QuoteOfTheDay
Thank you to Harriet Sheep for sacrificing her life. We plant this hawthorn bush to remember her. #RIPHarrietSheep
All animals must be ready to die for Animal Farm if need be. #Sacrifice #Heroes #LongLiveAnimalFarm
Thank you so much for my 'Animal Hero First Class' medal. I am so happy. Aren't we lucky @Snowball? #Proud #MustWorkHarder
To Harriet the Sheep 'Animal Hero, Second Class' #Posthumously #DieForTheCause
What shall we call this battle? #Commemmorate #NamesAreImportant
It's agreed then. The Battle of the Cowshed. #NameThatBattle
Has any seen Mollie? #AbsentAgain
@Mollie I saw you over at the fence allowing one of Pilkington’s men to stroke your nose. Why would you do that?
I didn't.  Honestly. Please don't say anything.
MOLLIE'S GONE. Has anyone see her? #MyFriend
Laters Everyone! #HereComesTheSugar #NosePetting #PrettyRibbons
I heard the pigeons saw her. In Willingdon. With ribbons. And being stroked. #MollieTraitor #NotToBementionedAgain
#spotlightonsnowball
Snowball is wasting his time on complicated schemes and plans. They won't work. Don't waste your time with him. #IAmTopPig #WhoNeedsPlans
I've got it! A windmill. It will generate electricity. Warm stalls. Lights. Tools. #YouKowItMakesSense.
#JonesLibrary
Do you want to build a windmill? #Frozen3 #WarmWinter #NoOlafHere
The windmill won't work. It's a crazy idea. #SnowballLostIt
It will. Feel free to come and see my plans in the shed. It will give us a 3 day week. #4DaysOff #Animalism #WorkingTogether
We need to increase food production, not have crazy plans.  It'll never work, and we'll all die of starvation. #GrowUpSnowball
#VoteWell
What's the point? Windmill or no windmill, life will go on as always. Badly. #StillGrumpy
We need more guns and stuff. We need to defend ourselves.#AngryJones #WordHasSpread
Let's send out the pigeons. They can stir up rebellion with the animals on the other farms. #Rebellion #TheMoreTheMerrier #SayNoToGuns
See you in the barn on Sunday to discuss the windmill plans. Pls ReTrot.#WindmillsForever #NapoleonKnowsNothing
Napoleon speaks sense.  So does Snowball. #Confused. #WWBD
@Benjamin what do you think? #WWBD
Neither #BoredNow
Whoah. Snowball run! #RunForYourLife
What just happened? Where is Snowball? Who are those dogs? #Confused.
No more Sunday meetings to discuss farm business. The pigs will discuss and report back our decisions. But we will still meet to sing Beasts of England.
Loyalty and obedience are the way forward and the only way to stop Jones returning.  Surely comrades you do not want Jones back? #FakeNews #PigsKnowBest.
If Comrade Napoleon says it, it must be right. #NapoleonAlwaysRight
Why has Old Major's skull been dug up? #LetHimRIP
Another order. Great. We must file past it every Sunday before getting our orders for the week. #DoImissJones?
For my best comrade, Benjamin
The windmill will be built. It will be hard work and rations may be reduced. The build will take two years. The pigs have planned it all. #PigsRule #WindmillWasMyIdea
The windmill was Napoleon's idea and Snowball sole his plan. #FakeNews #TheyFellForIt
Oh for goodness sake. Make your mind up. #Eyeroll #Sigh #Bored
As you are all doing so well, we are increasing your hours to a 60 hour week. This is voluntary. However if you don't work you will get hald rations. #ChoiceIsYours #PigsRule
I will work harder. Napoleon is always right.
Thanks to @Cockerel for waking me up so I can get to work early. #AlarmClock #IWillWorkHarder
Please be careful @Boxer. Slow down a bit. I'm worried about you
What she said. #BFF
We need some iron for our shoes. Anyone moved it? #Can'tFindTheIron
Napoleon has a new policy to share later. #ListenToNapoleon
We are starting to trade with neighbouring farms, just to get the materials we need. #SellThatHay
May need to sell some eggs at the market. @TheHens you get to contribute to the windmill build in your own special way #EggsForSale
For those of you wondering about money and trade, there was never anything said about it.  You may have dreamt it? #Nightmares
It must be Monday. There's Mr Whymper with Napoleon... #TradeWithHumans #GladItsNotMe
Have you seen this windmill plan? There's no way it will work. #StupidAnimals
It will clearly fall down. I might send it to Jones for a laugh!
Have you seen? The pigs have moved into the farmhouse. Wasn't there something about that? Can anyone remember? #DodgyMemory
It's Thursday!
It is vital that pigs have somewhere quiet to plan.  And the farmhouse is nothing less than our Leader, Napoleon deserves. #NapoleonOurLeader #FarmhouseOK
Napoleon is always right.
@Muriel what is the fourth commandment? Is it about not sleeping in a bed? #7Commandments #NumberFour
No animal shall sleep in a bed with sheets. #HasThisChanged?
It's always said that. A bed is just a bed. We don't use sheets. Obviously.
Enjoyed working by moonlight tonight. I will work harder. #NapoleonIsAlwaysRight
Hurray! A windmill. #EyeRoll
Do you know who has destroyed our windmill comrades? Snowball. This is his doing.
It was very stormy last night. Look at the tree over there, blown down. #JustSayin
We start the rebuild today #LongLiveTheWindmill #LongLiveAnimalFarm
Did you hear about the windmill falling down? I told you the plans were rubbish. The walls were too thin.#YouNeedABiggerWall
I will work harder. #ItsSnowing
Did anyone find any food today? Really feeling the hunger now. #MouldyPotatoes
I heard the animals were dying and eating each other. Ha ha ha!
Whymper believed we have loads of food. Well done everyone. It worked. #BinsFullOfSand
But when will we be getting the food? #Hungry #Grumpier
@TheHens we need your eggs. We need 400 a week to pay for the food until summer. #KeepLaying
DO NOT feed the hens under any circumstances. They are refusing to work for the greater good. #EggsForAll #GiveUsYourEggs #NoFoodForYou
Snowball has been here at night.  Stay vigilant. #TraitorInOurMidst
He’s been everywhere. I’ve smelt him.
Comrades! Snowball was in league with Jones from the start. He was Jones’ secret agent. #Traitor #HowCouldHe #TheresEvidence
But… but… but he was wounded #SnowballIsInnocentProbably
Our Leader, Comrade Napoleon has stated that Snowball was in league with Jones from long before the Battle of the Cowshed. #BelieveIt
Ah. If Comrade Napoleon says it, it must be right. #LongLiveNapoleon
I love these...
Word of warning. Snowball's agents are among us... #StayVigilant
Look Napoleon's wearing his medals. He's Animal Hero, First Class AND Animal Hero, Second Class. #SoBrave
Napoleon's dogs are looking vicious today #StayAway #LookAtThoseTeeth
I don't understand how this could happen. There have been no animals killed since Jones? Maybe it's our fault. I must work harder. An hour extra each day. #GetUpEarly
Let's sing. #BeastsOfEngland
Here comes Squealer to join in. #EyeRoll #SingItSquealer
Beasts of England has been banned. The rebellion is over. The traitors were executed. We don't need the song anymore.
It's ok. @Minimus has written us another song.  I wonder what it's like?
The sixth commandment says: "No animal shall kill any other animal without cause." #DidItChange #ItCantHaveDone
Why is Squealer always reading figures to us? I'd rather have more food. #StillHungry  #AndGrumpy
Minimus wrote a poem aswell
Napoleon said Minimus could put it on the wall of the barn. Next to a painting by Squealer. #FamousPoet
Getting some great timber from Manor Farm #WontCallItAnimalFarm
Stay vigilant. Frederick thinks he can take Animal Farm. #OurFarm #LongLiveAnimalFarm
DEATH TO FREDERICK #EnemyOfAnimalFarm
We did it! We have a windmill! #LongLiveNapoleon
Congratulations everyone. Welcome to Napoleon Mill. #MyWindmill
Meeting in the barn. Announcement from Comrade Napoleon. Don't be late.
We sold the timber to Frederick. So, DEATH TO PILKINGTON.
@Pilkington Ha! Got the timber. At a great price. Wait til you hear. #HowMuch? #WantThatFarm
DEATH TO FREDERICK. He stole from us. The money wasn't real. He may carry out an attack now. #DeathToFrederick
Sent a note to Napoleon saying, "Serves you right." Bet he's sorry. #ShouldHaveSoldToMe
I could see they were making a hole for blasting powder. And then there was no more windmill. Again. #BoredNow #LetsBuildARollercoaster
I have never felt so angry as when they blew up our beautiful windmill. Two years it took us. We attacked in anger. Not the best thing to do. They deserved it. #OurWindmillGone
My leg hurts. Too many pellets inside. Can I rebuild the windmill? I'm eleven years old. #GettingTired #BrokenHeart
We can rebuild the windmill. We won! The men were chased off. Congratulations. Celebrations beginining in the barn. Extra food for all. #AndThenWeStartAgain.
Number 5. No animal shall drink alcohol to excess. Did it always say this? #FuzzyMemory
I will work harder. Napoleon is always right. #Rebuild #Injured
Thanks @Clover for you know what! I think it's getting better. #Friends #Healing
I miss my mum
Rations again? Wish I was a dog or a pig
Congratulations @Napoleon on your 31 kids! #LongLiveNapoleon #LotsAndLotsOfPigs
How come the pigs are getting beer every day? #WhatAboutUs?
Once a week we shall hold a Spontaneous Demonstration.  Feel free to write me poems and we will celebrate everything. #LongLiveMe
I am now President. Thanks to all who voted for me. It's an honour. #PresidentNapoleon #LongLiveNapoleon #NapoleonRocks
Congratulations President Napoleon! #AnimalFarmRepublic
I'm back! #DidYouMissMe?
I must work harder #BitTired
Really worried about Boxer @Benjamin. He's not getting any younger. #OverWork #TakeItEasier
@Clover. He won't listen. He is determined. #BFF #Worried
Boxer has fallen. QUICK EVERYONE> #HeroBoxer
@Benjamin we'll stay here with Boxer. For as long as it takes. #PoorBoxer #StayStrong
Comrade Napoleon is saddened that Boxer is hurt and is arranging for him to be treated at the hospital. It's the best place for him to get better. #Glue #Cash
Thank you to my two BFFs @Benjamin and @Clover for staying by my side during this enforced rest time. Hopefully I will be retiring soon and will spend much time with them. #ReallyTiredNow

They took him away. The idiots thought it was to the hospital and I tols them it was to the knacker's. I can read. We shouted at Boxer and he tried to kick his way out but was too late. My heart is broken. #BFF #RIPBoxer
I was with Boxer in hosiptal as he died. It was a peaceful death. His last words were: Long live Animal Farm! Long live Comrade Napoleon! Napolean is always right!
The van belonged to the vet. He hadn't painted over the previous owner's name #WickedRumour #WoolOverEyes
At Sunday's meeting we will give time to Boxer's memory.
There were some nice things said but I don't understand why we didn't have Boxer back to bury him. #MissMyFriend #HeartBroken
I wonder where the pigs got the money from to buy the whisky. #Angry #PoorBoxer #MissMyFriend
Comrade Napoleon says excellent work on the second windmill everyone #WorkHarder
Hey #Clover I dreamt of Boxer the other night. #Sad #Grumpy
@Benjamin, I still miss him #MyHeart
The truest happiness lays in working hard and living frugally #InspiringYou #LongLiveMe
Never forget we are the only farm in the whole country run by animals. #LongLiveAnimalFarm
All the sheep must come with me in the morning to the other end of the farm for a special task. #Sheep #FollowMe
I couldn't believe what I was seeing.  How is it possible they are walking on two legs? And Napoleon had a whip. What is happening? #WorldFallingApart #CantBelieveMyEyes
I looked at Clover. We couldn't believe this was happening. The other animals were looking scared and confused. #What's happening?
Then we went to the commandments and I asked Benjamin to check they were all there.
It said ALL ANIMALS ARE EQUAL BUT SOME ANIMALS ARE MORE EQUAL THAN OTHERS. Nothing suprised us from then. #WorldUpsideDown #CrazyTimes
The newspapers, the clothes, the pipes and the whips. #ResignedToItAll
Why are there farmers in the house with the pigs? #Confused
Having a wonderful time at Animal Farm. My toast - Here's to the prosperity of Animal Farm. #ThanksForHavingUs

My toast - We will no longer use the name comrade, the boar's skull has been buried, we have a new flag - plain green, and from now on the farm will be know as The Manor Farm. To the prosperity of The Manor Farm. #WonderfulTimesAhead
We all looked through the window and couldn't tell who was a pig and who was a man...
